note.p: Education: University of Utrecht; University of Leyden. MD (1840)
Career: Military Surgeon, Flushing; Lecturer in Physiology, Military Medical School, Utrecht; Professor Extraordinary, Utrecht (1847); practised in Utrecht; died of apoplexy
Obituaries: Proc Roy Soc 1890-1891 vol 49 pp vii-xxiv, plate (frontispiece), signed by W B
Notes: One signature on election certificate struck through
